1:
God, act mercifully toward me because men are attacking me!\q2 All day long an enemy presses closer and closer to me because they want to take my life.
\q1
2:
All day long my enemies seek to crush the life from me,\q2 there are many enemies attacking me!



\q1
3:
But whenever I am afraid,\q2 I trust in you.
\q1
4:
God, I praise you because you do what you have promised;\q2 I trust in you, and then I am not afraid.
\q2 Ordinary humans certainly cannot harm me!



\q1
5:
All day long my enemies claim that I said things that I did not say;\q2 they are always thinking of ways to harm me.
\q1
6:
In order to cause trouble for me, they hide\q2 and watch everything that I do,
\q2 waiting for an opportunity to kill me.



\q1
7:
So, God, punish them for the wicked things that they are doing;\q2 show that you are angry by defeating those people!
\q1
8:
You have counted all the times that I have been wandering alone;\q2 it is as though you have put all my tears in a bottle
\q2 so that you can see how much I have cried.
\q2 You have counted my tears and written the number in your book.



\q1
9:
When I call out to you, my God, my enemies will be defeated;\q2 I know that will happen because you are fighting for me.
\q1
10:
I praise you that you do what you have promised;\q2 Yahweh, I will always praise you for that.
\q2
11:
I trust in you, and as a result, I will not be afraid.\q2 I know that humans cannot really harm me!



\q1
12:
I will bring to you the offering that I promised;\q1 I will bring an offering to you to thank you
\q1
13:
because you have rescued me from being killed;\q2 you have kept me from stumbling.
\q2 And so I will continue to live with God every day
\q in his light that gives me life.
